list.name: Changes
list.comment: Update GitHub Actions schedule to midnight for daily build trigger

task.summary:
Add GitHub profile README with dynamic SVG stats and migration settings
- Created `.idea` configuration files for migration services with "COMPLETED" status. - Added `README.md` with light/dark mode SVGs. - Implemented `today.py` script for dynamic stat generation via GitHub GraphQL. - Included additional resources: cache, requirements, and inspection profiles.
Updated light_mode.svg and dark_mode.svg to improve styling consistency and spacing alignment. Removed placeholder ASCII art and redundant metadata for cleaner SVG outputs.

Add GitHub Actions workflow for README updates and update `.idea` configuration
- Created `build.yaml` to automate README updates on `main` branch pushes and nightly schedules. - Updated `.idea` files for additional Git integrations and migration settings.
Add manual workflow dispatch trigger to GitHub Actions build configuration

Refactored `today.py` for improved readability and functionality, updated `.idea` configuration
- Simplified `today.py` by removing redundant comments and streamlining functions. - Added `.idea/misc.xml` for Python SDK configuration. - Made additional refinements in `.idea/workspace.xml` to enhance integration and workflow management.
Update GitHub Actions workflow dependencies to latest versions

Updated light_mode.svg and dark_mode.svg for enhanced clarity and consistency
- Refined programming stack display and replaced shorthand notations with full names. - Improved alignment and updated metrics (commits and LOC) to reflect recent changes. - Adjusted `.idea` workspace settings and tasks for better integration.

Enhance GitHub Actions and `.idea` configuration
- Added permissions and refined cache usage in `build.yaml`. - Improved commit process with skip-ci option and enhanced token usage. - Updated `.idea` workspace for improved task and settings management.
Fix incorrect formatting in light_mode.svg for LOC stats display
Update GitHub Actions schedule to midnight for daily build trigger

- Removed extensive in-line comments and redundant docstrings. - Simplified method implementations for GitHub GraphQL API usage. - Improved SVG formatting with dynamic element spacing adjustments. - Updated `.idea` files for compatibility and migration configurations.

- Refined programming stack display and replaced shorthand notations with full names. - Improved alignment and updated metrics (commits and LOC) to reflect recent changes. - Adjusted `.idea` workspace settings and tasks for better integration.
